thread.section_title: Matboard and More Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Matboard and More | matboardandmore.com | 4 of 130
thread.title: Janice
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by Janice

author: Janice
title: Janice
text: I live in a small town and am unable to acquire mat boards without traveling. So I used this company. The website was easy to use and led me through the process of entering measurements. The mat arrived well-packaged and it was cut perfectly. The shipping is very high, and I was disappointed about that, but the ease of using the website and the ability to receive a high-quality product made it tolerable.
